articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Why the Internet Is Comparing Cristiano Ronaldo to Homelander - IGN
articles.description: Here's why the internet is comparing Portugal star Cristiano Ronaldo to Homelander from The Boys.
articles.content: Real-world football isnt our usual beat for news coverage here on IGN, but after Cristiano Ronaldos performance in Portugals penalties victory over Slovenia at Euro 2024 last night, we have that rare… [+3329 chars]

articles.author: Gary Rose
articles.title: Euro 2024: France through but scoring struggles and Kylian Mbappe mask issues continue - BBC.com
articles.description: An own goal was enough to send France into the Euro 2024 quarter-finals at Belgium's expense but their scoring struggles remain a concern.
articles.content:
Football in its simplest form is entertainment, and scoring goals plays a big part in that.
Speaking to one France fan before Monday's match in Dusseldorf, he complained that they were too boring, a… [+1371 chars]
